ModMetaData.name: Graphic Chair Overhaul - Update Version
ModMetaData.author: Si-Cafe
ModMetaData.description: Mod that makes your colonists look like they're actually sitting on the chairs! Now supports: -Core -Royalty -Rimkea -Gloomy Furniture -Vanilla Furniture Expanded -Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Spacer Module To make it work with it, just load the GCO below that mods.
